entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
